title: Integer variables..2
description: Now that you have a basic idea about integer variables we want you to modify your variable. Variables are mutable, these means after assigning them one value you can later reassign them a different value i.e int num = 1 ; ... then leter int num = 2. Now we want you to create a variable called number and assign it a value of 21. Then change his variable to have a value of 200.
hints: Don't forget to end each line of code that is inside of the curly brackets with a semicolon ';'
